New Records: LaMelo Ball scored 36 points, tying him with Steph Curry for the most 3-pointers in the first six games of the season; Jayson Tatum led the Celtics with 29 points, though he struggled from the 3-point line; Brandon Miller returned from injury and contributed 16 points and six assists
Key Match Events: The Hornets had a 17-2 run in the third quarter, turning the momentum in their favor; the Celtics capitalized on the Hornets' foul trouble, making 25-of-28 free throws compared to the Hornets' 6-of-9
Post-Match Reflections: Hornets Head Coach Charles Lee praised the team's second-half effort and mentioned the Celtics' ability to capitalize on the Hornets' mistakes; the loss was seen as a missed opportunity despite the competitive level in the second half
